turns.answer:
Is that what you are doing? Do you want to tell everybody how you are playing?

You are an idiot. You have a very good idea what you are doing.

In Mafia, you can do what you want.

turns.answer: This night, at some point, I went to the place where the raid was going to happen (on the same street) and I wasn't there in the morning. So, I guess I'm asking about my day last night. What
